chapter.title: Required libraries
chapter.para:
These libraries are required to build and install PDF Editor:
qt3Qt GUI Toolkit (Version 3.x)
qsaQt Script for Applications
boostBoost C++ Libraries
xlibX Window System libraries
For rebuilding documentation from DocBook .xml files, docbook2html and gmake (GNU make) is required

book.chapter: Compiling from source In CVS root (or root of distribution archive) type make to compile PDF Editor and re-genereate documentation (if needed)
Installing from source In CVS root (or root of distribution archive) type make install to install PDF Editor
